product_name: medicubeZero Pore Blackhead Deep Cleansing Oil
summary: SummaryMedicubes's All-in-One Zero Pore Blackhead Deep Cleansing Oil: Dissolves sebum, blackheads, and makeup in one step. Specialized ingredients target sebum and help remove hardened impurities within the pores.
details: DetailsBenefitsMelts away blackheads and excess sebum for visibly clearer poresMinimizes the look of pores with consistent use, leaving skin smoother and more refinedGentle yet effective, suitable for sensitive skin with a non-stripping, hydrating formulaFeaturesInfused with plant-derived oils (like jojoba and sunflower seed) to deeply cleanse without irritationContains LHA (Lipo Hydroxy Acid) to exfoliate gently and help prevent future cloggingRefreshing Oil-to-Milk Cleansing Oil: Transforms into a milky texture when emulsifiedDermatologist-tested, non-comedogenic formula safe for daily useKey IngredientsLHA: Targets textured skin and whiteheadNiacinamide: Targets sebum and blackheadGuaiazulene: Targets congested poresHyaluronic acid: Hydration and moisturizes skinItem 2645354How To UseStep 1 - Pump 2-3 times and apply it to dry hands.Step 2 - Gently massage onto your face to dissolve sebum and blackheads.Step 3 - Add water and massage until the oil turns white and milky to effectively care for sebum, blackheads, and pores.For external use only. Discontinue use if irritation occurs. Keep out of reach of children.*Read instructions and caution before use.IngredientsGlycine Soja (Soybean) Oil, Sorbeth-30 Tetraoleate, Fragrance, Vitis Vinifera (Grape) Seed Oil, Olea Europaea (Olive) Fruit Oil, Melia Azadirachta Leaf Extract, Melia Azadirachta Flower Extract, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Ricinus Communis (Castor) Seed Oil, Macadamia Integrifolia Seed Oil, Corylus Avellana (Hazelnut) Seed Oil, Argania Spinosa Kernel Oil, Oryza Sativa (Rice) Bran Oil, Camellia Japonica Seed Oil, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Coccinia Indica Fruit Extract, Aloe Barbadensis Flower Extract, Solanum Melongena (Eggplant) Fruit Extract, Ocimum Sanctum Leaf Extract, Corallina Officinalis Extract, Curcuma Longa (Turmeric) Root Extract, Water, Butylene Glycol, Capryloyl Salicylic Acid, Allantoin, Niacinamide, Guaiazulene, Asiaticoside, Asiatic Acid, Madecassic Acid, Tocopherol, 1,2-Hexanediol, Pentylene Glycol, Salix Alba (Willow) Bark Extract, Chamaecyparis Obtusa Leaf Extract, Origanum Vulgare Leaf Extract, Sodium Hyaluronate, Pinus Densiflora Leaf Extract, Madecassoside, Scutellaria Baicalensis Root Extract, Cinnamomum Cassia Bark Extract, Portulaca Oleracea Extract, Lactobacillus/Soybean Ferment Extract, Decyl Glucoside, Pueraria Lobata Root Extract, Pinus Palustris Leaf Extract, Ulmus Davidiana Root Extract, Oenothera Biennis (Evening Primrose) Flower Extract, Caprylyl Glycol, Ethylhexylglycerin.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Step 1 - Pump 2-3 times and apply it to dry hands.Step 2 - Gently massage onto your face to dissolve sebum and blackheads.Step 3 - Add water and massage until the oil turns white and milky to effectively care for sebum, blackheads, and pores.For external use only. Discontinue use if irritation occurs. Keep out of reach of children.*Read instructions and caution before use.

reviews.headline: Did nothing for blackheads and soybean oil is bad
reviews.comments: Soybean oil does not belong on your face, it is highly comedogenic, and this wash does not lather well or rinse off completely. Needless to even say, next day after using I have a pimple in an area of my face where I typically never break out, and the blackheads I bought this to target haven't remotely budged or risen to the surface. This is so overpriced for what it is: garbage.

reviews.headline: Best I have ever used!
reviews.comments: I have used many cleansing oils/balms and this one is hands down the best. Easily takes off sunscreen and makeup. Gentle and effective! I will purchase forever.

reviews.headline: Sebum and blackheads don't stand a chance
reviews.comments: Ive tried a few cleansing oils, But none of them compared to this one. I have always had stubborn closed comedones on my chin and this stuff pulls them right out. I need to get another bottle for back asap.

rollup.name: Zero Pore Blackhead Deep Cleansing Oil
